mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.sum, i.account_id, i.date, i.income_category_id AS ic_id, ic.name AS ic_name, ic.user_id AS ic_user_id, ic.access_to_delete AS ic_access_to_delete FROM income i LEFT JOIN income_category ic ON ic.id = i.income_category_id WHERE i.date <= #{beforeDate} AND i.date >= #{afterDate} AND ic.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY i.date DESC
